channel.title: admin on Zhi Yang
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Zhi Yang

item.description: Zhi Yang is a PhD candidate in biostatistics at the University of Southern California. She has been providing statistical support to a wide range of research teams in both academia and industry to answer real-life problems, including e-cigarette policy, Alzheimer’s prevention, drug marketing strategy, free-roaming dogs vaccination strategy in Africa, colorectal cancer development, e-cigarette use among adolescents and etc. She has over six years’ programming experiences in R, SQL, SAS, and Stata.
